p:
B5: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(3″-nitrophenyl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethoxy)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 55%; m.p. 71 °C; R
f = 0.72 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1659 (C=O), 1626 (Ar C=C), 1532 (CH=CH), 1248 (-CF 3), 3019 (Ar C-H stretching), 1127 (-C-O-), 1448 (NO 2); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): δ: 7.06 (1H, d, J = 16.3 Hz, CO-CH=), 8.05 (1H, d, J = 16.2 Hz, Ar-CH=), 7.76–8.03 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 7.08–7.79 (4H, m, C-2″, 4″, 5″, 6″, Ar-H); ESI-MS: 338.35 [M + H] +.
